mapper.select:
select A.city,ifnull(NUMB,0) AS count from (SELECT DISTINCT c.city ,c.id FROM sys_city_two c ) A LEFT JOIN (SELECT d.dept_name as city,d.dept_id as dept ,SUM(count) as NUMB FROM rail_briefing_count c ,sys_dept d ,rail_briefing b WHERE c.dept_id = d.dept_id and c.briefing_id = b.id and b.`status` = 3
and b.release_time >= #{startTime}
and #{endTime} >= b.release_time
GROUP BY c.dept_id) B on B.city = A.city ORDER BY A.id
